section_subtitle: Solid technical techniques and human skills to build quality products.

leadership.title: Leadership
leadership.description: Experience leading and mentoring development teams. I manage tasks to ensure timely deliveries and foster collaboration.

communication.title: Effective Communication
communication.description: Effective communication in agile teams (Scrum) to align technical and business areas, ensuring the success of every project.

problem_solving.title: Problem Solving
problem_solving.description: I translate business problems into technical solutions. I have optimized over 40 SQL queries and resolved over 300 critical tickets.

thinking.title: Critical Thinking
thinking.description: With an analytical approach, I design solutions and architectures that optimize processes and deliver real business value.

adaptability.title: Adaptability
adaptability.description: Rapid adaptation to diverse technological environments. Proven experience ranging from C/C++ to serverless architectures with AWS.

continuous_learning.title: Continuous Learning
continuous_learning.description: I strengthen my backend skills with NestJS, NoSQL, Docker, and DevOps practices to improve continuous delivery.

highlight_subtitle: Beyond the code, I combine my technical skills with leadership, communication, and critical thinking. The result: solid, secure, and maintainable products, with consistent delivery and continuous learning.
